org.sandag.popsyn.validator
Class Validator

java.lang.Object
  org.sandag.popsyn.validator.Validator

public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object

This class calculates validation measures by comparing the observed data and estimated PopSyn II results. It also writes out the outputs.

Field Summary
protected  double[][] diff
          The percentage difference between estimated and observed validation attributes where the first dimension is the PUMA ID and the second dimension is the validation attribute ID.
protected  double[] maxDiff
          The maximum percentage difference between estimated and observed validation attributes across all PUMAs indexed by validation attribute ID.
protected  double[] meanDiff
          The mean difference between estimated and observed validation attributes across all PUMAs indexed by validation attribute ID.
protected  double[] minDiff
          The minimum percentage difference between estimated and observed validation attributes across all PUMAs indexed by validation attribute ID.
protected  double[][] perCensus
          The validation measures based on observed data tables.
protected  double[][] perSynPop
          The validation measures based on results from a PopSyn II run.
protected  int pumaCount
          PUMA count
protected  double[] stdDev
          The standard deviation of the percentage difference between estimated and observed validation attributes across all PUMAs indexed by validation attribute ID.
protected  int valCount
          validation attribute count.
protected  Version version
          The Version object
protected  ValMetricsCalculator vMetrics
          The valMetricsCalculator object.

          Creates a Validator object with a specified Version object and ValidatorDao object

          Calculates the validation measures by comparing observed and estimated PopSyn II results.
 double[] getMaxDiff()
          Gets the maximum percentage difference between observed and estimated values by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

          Returns the mean percentage difference between observed and estimated values by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

          Returns the minimum percentage difference between observed and estimated values by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

 double[] getStdDev()
          Gets the standard deviation of percentage value differences between observed and estimated by validation attributes across all PUMAs.
 Version getVersion()
          Gets the Version object.

Validator

public Validator(Version aVersion,
                 ValidatorDao vDao)
Creates a Validator object with a specified Version object and ValidatorDao object

Parameters:

vDao - the ValidatorDao object
Method Detail

reportOutput

public void reportOutput(ValidatorDao vDao)
Calculates validation measures and writes results to output tables.

Parameters:
vDao - the ValidatorDao object

calculate

private void calculate()
Calculates the validation measures by comparing observed and estimated PopSyn II results. The measures include mean, minimum, maximum differences and standard deviation.

writeResult

private void writeResult()
Writes the validation measures to a CSV file.

writeResultByPuma

private void writeResultByPuma()
Writes the validation measures by PUMA to a CSV file.

Pivots a two dimensional array.

Returns:
the pivoted two dimensional array

private java.lang.String[] setLabels(int count)
Sets the sequential IDs of the validation attributes

Parameters:
count - number of validation attributes
Returns:
the single dimensional array of validation attribute IDs in String format

getVersion

public Version getVersion()
Gets the Version object.

Returns:
the Version object

getPerCensus

public double[][] getPerCensus()
Returns the observed validation attributes.

Returns:
a two dimensional array of percentage values with the first dimension as PUMA ID and the second dimension as the validation attribute ID.

getPerSynPop

public double[][] getPerSynPop()
Returns the estimated validation attributes.

Returns:
a two dimensional array of percentage values with the first dimension as PUMA ID and the second dimension as the validation attribute ID.

getMeanDiff

public double[] getMeanDiff()
Returns the mean percentage difference between observed and estimated values by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

Returns:
a single dimensional array of mean percentage differences indexed by validation attribute ID.

getStdDev

public double[] getStdDev()
Gets the standard deviation of percentage value differences between observed and estimated by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

Returns:
a single dimensional array of standard deviations indexed by validation attribute ID.

getMaxDiff

public double[] getMaxDiff()
Gets the maximum percentage difference between observed and estimated values by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

Returns:
a single dimensional array of maximum percentage values indexed by validation attribute ID.

getMinDiff

public double[] getMinDiff()
Returns the minimum percentage difference between observed and estimated values by validation attributes across all PUMAs.

Returns:
a single dimensional array of minimum percentage values indexed by validation attribute ID.
